dishes.title: Herb Lemon Chicken Steak
dishes.des: Fresh Herb Marinate. Chicken Leg Quarter. Roasted Potatoes. Side Veggies. Garlic Rice. Pepper Gravy.

dishes.title: Smoked Salmon Salad
dishes.des: Chilled BBQ Chicken Slices. Cucumber. Tomatoes. Red Onions. Purple Cabbage. Olives. Mixed Greens. BBQ Mayo Dressing. Shaved Cheddar Cheese.

dishes.title: Creamy Beef Salpicado

dishes.title: Shrimp + Sundried Tomato Cream

dishes.title: Spicy Honey Fried Chicken Sandwich
dishes.des: Boneless Fried Chicken Steak. Labuyo Honey. Mixed Greens. Coleslaw. Pickled Dill Cucumber. Buttered Brioche. Potato Chips.
